case.name: Von Reisner v Commonwealth (No 3) [2008] FCA 1028 (8 July 2008)

citphrases.citphrase: s 78b(1) requires a cause to be " pending " in a federal court
proposal to file amended application is not a cause " pending "
s 78b further has no application where a pleading raises trivial or unarguable points, or is frivolous or vexatious
proposed amended application considered to be frivolous or vexatious or unarguable

legistitles.title: FEDERAL COURT OF AUSTRALIA ACT 1976
FEDERAL COURT OF AUSTRALIA ACT 1976 - SECT 31A Summary judgment
